com.regawmod.entity

Class MovableEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.regawmod.entity.Entity
      • com.regawmod.entity.MovableEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class MovableEntity
extends Entity
    An entity that has the ability to move
    Author:
    Dan Wager

      • getBactrackComponent

        protected float getBactrackComponent(float dt)
        Gets a value indicating the amount of pixels to move when backtracking to the wall after collision.
        Parameters:
        dt - The delta time between frames
        Returns:
        The distance to travel backwards

      • turnAround

        protected void turnAround()
        Turns the entity around by multiplying speed by -1.
